english.segment1: I have tried to follow, I have tried to lead. I have failed at everything. I have been the culprit to my selfish needs, made everything but You my King
english.segment2: I couldn't be any less worthy. To spend one day much less forever with You
english.segment3: (Chorus 1:). I lift my hands just as I am, I'm letting go of false control. I lift my voice, I have no choice. My life is Yours, use me for Your fame, Your fame
english.segment4: I have not seen heaven, I haven't seen Your face. But I've seen Your Spirit move. And Jesus it's amazing the evidence of grace standing all around this room
english.segment5: I'm merely a product of mercy. The target and victim of Your perfect love
english.segment6: (Chorus 2:). I lift my hands just as I am, I'm letting go of false control. I lift my voice, I have no choice. My life is Yours, use me for Your fame, spreading like a flame
english.segment7: Let every breath proclaim glory to Your name. You can't be contained and I'll never be the same
